data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Braničevski.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Braničevski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Braničevski, Serbia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 139 neighbors who are far from you in Braničevski. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Braničevski.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Egyptian, Balkan people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Egyptian, Balkan people.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Braničevski unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Braničevski.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Braničevski, Serbia has a population of 99,700.

We estimate Braničevski has 716 people who might know Jesus, 78,263 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 20,721 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 139 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Braničevski will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.
